field.name: paypal_mode
field.label: Paypal Mode
field.description: Set to Test Mode Or Live Mode

field.name: paypal_id
field.label: Paypal Email
field.description: Enter your Paypal ID or Paypal Email

field.name: shipping_label
field.label: Shipping Label
field.description: If set to Yes, EShop will pass shopper's shipping address to PayPal to use for Shipping Label.

field.name: icon
field.label: Icon
field.description: If you want to show icon instead of payment method title on checkout, upload it to media/com_eshop/payments folder and enter the name of the file here. For example os_paypal.png

field.name: payment_fee
field.label: Payment Fee (Fixed amount)
field.description: Enter a fixed amount of payment fee.

field.name: payment_fee_percentage
field.label: Payment Fee (Percentage)
field.description: Enter a number of percentage of Sub Total as payment fee.

field.name: payment_fee_min_total
field.label: Payment Fee Minimum Total
field.description: Enter minimum of Total before Payment Fee is removed.

field.name: min_total
field.label: Minimum Total
field.description: If you enter a Minimum Total value, then PayPal Payment plugin is only available if Order Total greater than Minimum Total.

field.name: max_total
field.label: Maximum Total
field.description: If you enter a Maximum Total value, then PayPal Payment plugin is only available if Order Total less than Maximum Total.

field.name: customer_groups
field.label: Customer Groups
field.description: Choose the customer groups to apply PayPal Payment method.

field.name: disabled_products
field.label: Disabled Products
field.description: Choose disabled products here. If the cart includes at least a disabled product, then the PayPal payment method will be not available.

field.name: ipn_log
field.label: Log IPN Messages
field.description: This is only used for debug purpose when requested. Please set it to No unless requested by our support team.
